mapper.insert: insert all into board (seq, name, id, email, subject, content, hit, logtime, bcode) values (#{seq}, #{name}, #{id}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{bcode}) into album (aseq, seq, orign_picture, save_picture, savefolder, type) values (album_aseq.nextval, #{seq}, #{orignPicture}, #{savePicture}, #{saveFolder}, 0) select * from dual
